item.title: Presentation Timer Tool
item.description: While searching for a tool that can be used as a countdown when delivering presentations & demonstration I found this tool “Presto’s Presentation Timer” . This tool can be customized based on the duration of the presentation and you can start/pause the countdown as and when required. You can download this presentation tool from this link http://prestonhunt.com/story/109
